channel.title: The Old Republic

"Your account has been selected to participate in the Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ Game Testing Program."
Inb4 it's shit.

item.title: The Old Republic
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:8, topic:421257”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=523920.msg3812237#msg3812237 date=1321047927]

[quote author=the elve age link=topic=523920.msg3812209#msg3812209 date=1321046810]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=523920.msg3811963#msg3811963 date=1321028629]
“Your account has been selected to participate in the Star Wars™: The Old Republic™ Game Testing Program.”

Inb4 it’s shit.
[/quote]Lucky bitch. I think it will be better than WoW.
[/quote]Anything is better than WoW, so that’s a pretty awful comparison.
[/quote]Yet WoW has millions of players. Anything to beat WoW in terms of players is a great comparison. And I also got the Beta email also.[/quote]McDonalds has millions of customers, and they serve low quality shit.
Player count is irrelevant really. The whole setup of mmorpg’s is absolutely shite as it’s all about grind grind grind grind.

Read full topic
